Title: The Travel Writer
Plot: Manny organises a travel-writing festival and invites a charming explorer to talk about his adventures. Fran soon falls for his twinkling eyes and lavish hair, leaving Manny ragingly jealous. Meanwhile, Bernard hires an assassin to solve a financial problem with his neighbour.
Writer: Andy Riley, Kevin Cecil, Dylan Moran
GuestStars: Patricia Franklin, Catherine Shepherd, Alice Lowe, Paul Hunter, Julian Rhind-Tutt
